thread.title: ‘The losers are Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer’: Trump speaks on Obamacare repeal failure from the Oval Office
thread.title_full: ‘The losers are Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer’: Trump speaks on Obamacare repeal failure from the Oval Office

author: Greg P.
title: ‘The losers are Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer’: Trump speaks on Obamacare repeal failure from the Oval Office
text:
‘The losers are Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer’: Trump speaks on Obamacare repeal failure from the Oval Office Posted at 5:14 pm on March 24, 2017 by Greg P. 
President Trump just wrapped up a brief Q&A with reporters from the Oval Office on the failure of the American Health Care Act. 
Some highlights… 
“We learned a lot”: Trump says "it certainly was an interesting period of time." He adds, "we learned a lot. We learned a lot about loyalty." 
— Alan Rappeport (@arappeport) March 24, 2017 
He’s “disappointed” in the conservative Freedom Caucus that opposed the bill, but he doesn’t blame them for the bill’s failure: Trump says he's "disappointed"&"a little suprised" when asked if he blames @freedomcaucus . Says a "better bill" will emerge. 
— Brit Hume (@brithume) March 24, 2017 
The president went out of his way to praise Speaker of the House Paul Ryan: Trump: "I want to thank the Republican party. I want to thank Paul Ryan. He worked very, very hard." 
— Gabby Morrongiello (@gabriellahope_) March 24, 2017 Trending
